channel.title: Zfs on LOVECTOR
channel.description: Recent content in Zfs on LOVECTOR

item.title: zpool status: too many errors
item.description: CHECK THE CABLE AND POWER CHECK THE STATUS OF THE SPECIFIC DISK smartctl -a /dev/sde Clear zpool clear tank SCRUB AT LEAST ONCE PER MONTH zpool scrub tank #stop scrubbing: zpool scrub -s tank CHECK STATUS zpool status -v
